item.title: By: cat

item.description:
thanks! Curious, where do I know you from?
Cat
item.content:encoded:
thanks! Curious, where do I know you from?

Cat

item.title: By: Bethelle
item.dc:creator: Bethelle
item.description: Hello Cat! I've been watching the development of your site with great anticipation, I'm glad that I've been able to finally see your talented eye, but lots more pictures would be received with much gratitude. lots of love bethelle xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
item.content:encoded:
Hello Cat!
I’ve been watching the development of your site with great anticipation, I’m glad that I’ve been able to finally see your talented eye, but lots more pictures would be received with much gratitude.
lots of love bethelle xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
